name: LAPPI - Unforgettable trip
description:
LAPPI - Unforgettable trip

LAPPI is 'trippy' point & click genre adventure game. Its something like Money Island, Botanicula, Samorost. LAPPI will be unforgettable trip to Finland Lapland, and its culture. That is an adventure you never forget.

In this adventure, you see northern lights, shaman drums, mushrooms, mountain in Lapland, santaclaus, brownies and of course reindeers and other Finnish animals, plants, trees, buildings, dark caves, space, universe, relaxing music etc. and game includes many puzzles and minigames.

There will be many "WTF moments" ;-)

Currently we are seeking financial help to this project.

  • We release LAPPI to Windows, OSX and Linux operating systems
  • Language Finnish and English
  • Release Q4/2019-Q1/2020 (if this campaing succeeds, otherwise later)

More information: https://igg.me/at/lappi/x/20640918

NOTE! Dialog system is disabled in this preview.
